item.title: CVE-2023-0356|2023-01-24T18:40:13.224Z -- socomec -- modulys%20gp
item.description: SOCOMEC MODULYS GP Netvision versions 7.20 and prior lack strong encryption for credentials on HTTP connections, which could result in threat actors obtaining sensitive information.
